title: PantryPals – Smart Kitchen App
description: A context-aware Android app using ML Kit, Firebase, and Jetpack Compose to track food expiry and power-outage events using UK-DALE dataset.

title: GetFit Victoria – Sports Activity Finder
description: A Vue3 + Firestore web app to help people find sports venues, rate facilities, and register for community events.

title: SwapUP – Toy & Game Swapping Platform
description: A mobile-first platform for parents and hobbyists to safely swap toys and collectibles with review-driven flows.
